pr_title: [Transform] Add test logging regarding conflict on start

timeline.message: add extra logging for investigation of #63365

timeline.bodyText: Should we log the whole exception's stack trace by supplying e as an argument to warn?
timeline.author: przemekwitek

replies.bodyText:
I decided against that because toString() lacks important information, e.g. it misses the status code and other details.
Note that after 10 retries, we get a stack trace.
replies.author: hendrikmuhs
